res.description: Daily mean temperature for relative death rate of leaves
Relative death rate of leaves as a function of daily mean temperature
DVS for fraction of total dry matter to roots
Fraction of total dry matter to roots as function of DVS
DVS for fraction of total dry matter to leaves
Fraction of total dry matter to leaves as function of DVS
DVS for fraction of total dry matter to stems
Fraction of total dry matter to stems as function of DVS
DVS for fraction of total dry matter to storage organs
Fraction of total dry matter to storage organs as function of DVS
DVS for maximum N concentration in leaves
Maximum N concentration in leaves as function of DVS
Absorption reduction factor as function of NNI

transform.input: SELECT CURRENTDATE, AirTemperatureMean, CASE WHEN EffectiveTempRateBeforeAnt > 0 THEN EffectiveTempRateBeforeAnt ELSE 0 END AS EffectiveTempRateBeforeAnt, CASE WHEN EffectiveTempRateAfterAnt > 0 THEN EffectiveTempRateAfterAnt ELSE 0 END AS EffectiveTempRateAfterAnt FROM (SELECT CURRENTDATE, AirTemperatureMean, CASE WHEN AirTemperatureMean > ${vTempLimit} THEN TempRateBeforeAnt - ${vTempSlopeAboveLimit} * (AirTemperatureMean - ${vTempLimit}) ELSE TempRateBeforeAnt END AS EffectiveTempRateBeforeAnt, CASE WHEN AirTemperatureMean > ${vTempLimit} THEN TempRateAfterAnt - ${vTempSlopeAboveLimit} * (AirTemperatureMean - ${vTempLimit}) ELSE TempRateAfterAnt END AS EffectiveTempRateAfterAnt FROM (SELECT CURRENTDATE, AirTemperatureMin, (AirTemperatureMin+AirTemperatureMax)* 0.5 AS AirTemperatureMean, (AirTemperatureMin+AirTemperatureMax)* 0.5 - ${vBaseTempBeforeAnt} AS TempRateBeforeAnt, (AirTemperatureMin+AirTemperatureMax)* 0.5 - ${vBaseTempAfterAnt} AS TempRateAfterAnt FROM weather))
